EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_UK_Office_Opening_Q114.Confirmation - non VIP
EmailTemplate.subject: RSVP Confirmation Pivotal UK Launch Party
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Thanks}},
Thank-you for RSVP'ing to the Pivotal UK Launch Party. Details can be found below, looking forward to seeing you there:
Date: Wednesday, March 5th, 2014 Time: 6:30pm - 9:30pm Location: McQueen <http://www.mcqueen-shoreditch.co.uk/> Address: 55-61 Tabernacle Street London, EC2A 4AA
Please email us at ateslia@gopivotal.com <mailto:ateslia@gopivotal.com> if you have any questions.
